workshoptitle: Discover new performance features in Oracle Database 19c

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Oracle Database 19c and the Oracle Database 19c New Features Workshop.

tutorials.title: Get started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Prepare your environment
tutorials.description: Steps to create the workshop-staged and workshop-installed compute instances.

tutorials.title: Initialize your environment
tutorials.description: Steps to verify the workshop-installed compute instance and download the lab files.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Use Memoptimized Rowstore - Fast Ingest
tutorials.description: Observe the behavior of Memoptimze Rowstore and observe how inserts are optimized.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Complete an ADDM analysis inside a PDB
tutorials.description: Complete an ADDM analysis inside of a PDB, also perform an analysis of a CDB.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Use Real-Time SQL Monitoring as a SQL Developer
tutorials.description: Use Real-Time SQL Monitoring as a SQL Developer.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Wait for in-memory objects to be populated
tutorials.description: Wait for in-memory objects to be populated.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Configure and use Database Replay at the PDB level
tutorials.description: Observe how Database Replay works at the PDB level.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
